  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TessellationRefined​(GeoTessGrid grid, InitialSolid initialSolid, int tessellationIndex, java.util.Collection<double[]> verticesToRefine, int maxEdgeLevel, int markThreshold)
    Given an exiting tessellation and an array of vertices this constructor will build a new tessellation where all the triangles that touch any of the verticesToRefine will be subdivided an additional time.

  • Constructor Details

    • TessellationRefined

      public TessellationRefined​(GeoTessGrid grid, InitialSolid initialSolid, int tessellationIndex, java.util.Collection<double[]> verticesToRefine, int maxEdgeLevel, int markThreshold) throws java.lang.Exception
      Given an exiting tessellation and an array of vertices this constructor will build a new tessellation where all the triangles that touch any of the verticesToRefine will be subdivided an additional time.
      Parameters:
      grid - existing grid that is to be refined.
      tessellationIndex - index of the tessellation in grid that is to be refined.
      verticesToRefine - an array of unit vectors containing the locations of the vertices that are to be refined.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if any of the specified vertices are not colocated with a vertex in grid.

  • Method Details

    • isDivisible

      public boolean isDivisible​(Triangle triangle)
      Return true if the specified triangle should be subdivided into smaller elements.

      Returns:
      boolean
